appearance:
Moldings exhibit flash formation,
e. g. at the mold parting surface.
cause:
1.Fitting tolerances of the two halves of the molding are too great or the mold parting line is damaged.
2.Clamp force of the machine is inadequate or is set too low.
3.Melt temperature, injection speed or internal mold pressure is too high.
correction:
1.Adjust mold to permissible fitting tolerances and repair existing damage in mold parting line.
2.Set the clamp force higher or change to a larger machine.
3.Lower the injection pressure, injection speed or holding pressure or switch earlier from injection to holding pressure.
4.Reduce melt temperature and mold temperature.
